pullRequest.title: Update urls to use https instead of http
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #1333
This PR is [ready] for review.
Risk
This PR makes [no] API changes.
Summary
replace http with https where needed
Test Steps

Add logging to SDLProxyBase and PolicyFetcher to observe URLs
Run Android Test App and connect to manticore
Update the policy table url in manticore
Observe Logs to ensure Http is being replaced with Https in URLs and the app is able to communicate with the policy table

CLA

 I have signed the CLA

commit.message: Replace http urls with https for android/javaSE

nodes.bodyText: I see this is done in the icon caching PR so there is no need to make this change here

nodes.bodyText: Some getUrl() calls in LifecycleManager.java are missed like the ones from lines (446 > 466). These ones should be updated as well.
Can we store the updated url in a var and pass that var instead of doing the replacement multiple times?
It is not necessary to update that one
